snippet: A special Saturday night caucus intended to accommodate Orthodox Jews became the scene of controversy and confrontation after caucusgoers were told they had to sign a legal declaration.
abstract: Special Saturday evening Republican caucus in Las Vegas intended to accommodate Orthodox Jews who could not vote before sundown becomes the scene of controversy and confrontation after caucusgoers are told that to be admitted they must sign a legal declaration under penalty of perjury that they could not attend their daytime caucus because of religious beliefs.
lead_paragraph: A special Saturday night caucus intended to accommodate Orthodox Jews became the scene of controversy and confrontation after caucusgoers were told they had to sign a legal declaration.

headline.seo: Religious Caucus Causes Protest in Las Vegas
headline.main: Religious Condition Stirs Protest at a Caucus Site
